|brand = Synertau |model = Wi-CAT-AX |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Alfin |revision = Альфин |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 6 December 2022 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Synertau_Wi-CAT-AX_Alfin |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = WCAX |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Eon;EN25QH128A-104HIP2T; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = QChip;QN3B128M16H-16A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = E0:BB:0C |oui = E0:BB:0C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.113;Wive-NG-HQ;SLTS;Patchset 300+
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, HW NAT, PMF, TX Beamforming, BTM, WMM, BSS Coloring, Spatial Reuse |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = Admin |defaultssid = Wive-NG-HQ |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Wive-NG
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7905DAN; |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975DN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7905DAN; |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975DN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = none |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/who-is-wive-ng/ ''Wive-NG-HQ'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU)
The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. :Default SSIDs Wive-NG-HQ.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core) *Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: ''QChip'' 256MB (DDR3) *WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7905DAN (2x 2T2R 2.4/5GHz) :FEM: [[MediaTek]] MT7975DN (2x 2T2R 2.4/5GHz) :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn/ax (2T2R 2.4GHz)/20dBm (100mW) :802.11an/ac/ax Wi-Fi 6 (2T2R 5GHz)/23dBm (200mW) :Antenna: 4x 5dBi (external) *WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 3x GbE ports
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/wi-cat-ax/ ''Wi-CAT-AX Alfin'' on '''Wi-Cat'''] (RU) *[https://synertau.ru/stati/wi-cat-ax-alfin/ ''Wi-CAT-AX Alfin'' on '''Synertau'''] (RU) *[https://www.wmd.ru/articles/reviews/wireless-cat-alfin-sovremennyj-wi-fi-router-standarta-802-11ax.html ''Wi-CAT-AX Alfin'' on '''WMD'''] (RU)
==See also== ===Models=== *[[Synertau Wi-CAT-AX Alfin]] ''(Альфин)'' • AX1800 ([https://www.wmd.ru/products/wireless-cat-alfin.html WMD]) :[[MediaTek]] MT7621AT/MT7905DAN/MT7975DN *[[Synertau Wi-CAT-GL Chimera]] ''(Химера)'' • AC1200 ([https://www.wmd.ru/products/wireless-cat-ximera.html WMD]) :[[MediaTek]] MT7621DAT/MT7603EN/MT7613BEN
